title: Underline text not available
body: In newer versions of SkiaSharp, the SKPaint property UnderlineText is not available. Is this something that was removed intentionally?

comments.author: mattleibow
comments.body:
Unfortunately this feature was removed by Google - entirely:

 - https://github.com/google/skia/commit/a01bf9ab748836fc4bf271bd5024151bf1ce2e88

You may want to discuss this with Google (https://groups.google.com/forum/#!forum/skia-discuss) as I am not sure what the best way to do this is.

comments.author: mattleibow
comments.body: I am closing this as skia does not support this anymore.
